org.opentcs.util.statistics

Class StatisticsCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.util.statistics.StatisticsCollector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KernelExtension

    public class StatisticsCollector
extends java.lang.Object
implements KernelExtension
    Collects data from kernel events and logs interesting events to a file that can later be processed for statistical purposes.

    • Nested Class Summary
